title: Train service delay along North-East Line

title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api tertangguh di sepanjang Laluan Timur Laut

updates.text: [SBST] NEL Update:NEL train frequency 7.5 - 8mins until end of service today.Free shuttle bus service in both directions has ceased at 10pm.
[SBST] NEL Update:NEL train frequency 7.5 - 8mins until end of service today.Free shuttle bus service in both directions will cease at 10pm.
[NORTHEASTLINE]: LTA advised the fault in NEL signalling system has been rectified. Trains will be operating between 7.5 & 9 mins interval.
SBST advised that the service on NEL is now extended to 30 mins due to a new fault that has been found in their signaling system.
[SBST] UPDATE: North-East Line service towards HarbourFront is experiencing a 2 mins delay.
[NORTHEASTLINE]: Train service delay of about 15 mins along North-East Line.
